properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 3:39PM HST until January 11 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH
FRIDAY NIGHT...

.Moisture brought in by strong winds, combined with the approach
of an upper level disturbance, will produce bouts of snowfall
across the Big Island summits through Friday night.

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches.

* WHERE...Big Island Summits.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow may
significantly reduce visibility at times, with periods of zero
visibility.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for
slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while
driving.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY
